Philip.name: Philip
Philip.description:
<c=c9f000>PHILIP</c>
Your ship engineering officer. His cards modify other cards in your hand, provide <c=d6525f>redraw</c>, and are often unplayable.

redraw.name: Redraw
redraw.description: Lets you discard a card and draw a new one. Costs 1 redraw per discard.

customParts.name: Custom Parts
customParts.description: Gives you {0} redraw at the start of each turn.

BookOfTails.name: BOOK OF TAILS
BookOfTails.description: At start of turn, add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Fox Tale</c> to your hand.

Counting.name: COUNTING
Counting.description: At start of turn, count sheeps. Once you counted 7 sheep, gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY</c> and restart the counter.

description.None: Attack for set amount = 3. On hit, apply 1 <c=status>BOOST</c>.
description.A: Attack for set amount = 4. On hit, apply 1 <c=status>BOOST</c>.
description.B: Attack for set amount = 5. On hit, apply 2 <c=status>BOOST</c>.
